privacy_policy.label: Costco Wholesale Corporation Your Privacy Rights
privacy_policy.desc: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use and disclose personal information about you. This Privacy Policy applies to Costco Wholesale Corporation’s United States (US) and Puerto Rico subsidiaries ("Costco," "we," “our” or "us").

optout.label: Your Choices
optout.url: using the chat feature on costco.com
